  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void firstCatch​(game_service game)
    In the first catch, every agent catches the pokemon, by order of value: The first one, catches the max valued pokemon.
    private void init​(game_service game)
    Init the game: the method gets data from the server, and updates the zone: the graph, agents, pokemons.
    static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
    the main method for this class. it builds a frame and calls the game's client.
    private static java.util.LinkedList<CL_Pokemon> max2MinValue​(java.util.LinkedList<CL_Pokemon> pok_list)
    this method sorts the pokemons list by their value- from the max to the minimun values.
    private void pokemonsCatch​(game_service game)
    The main strategy of the agents, as for catching pokemons: Looks for the closest pokemon for every agent, uses shortestPathDist & shortestPath methods Looks for the pokemon with the closest src node.
    void run()
    The run method- uses, just like its name, to run a game. it calls all the needed functions for that

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args) throws org.json.JSONException
      the main method for this class. it builds a frame and calls the game's client.
      Throws:
      org.json.JSONException

    • run

      public void run()
      The run method- uses, just like its name, to run a game. it calls all the needed functions for that
      Specified by:
      run in interface java.lang.Runnable

    • init

      private void init​(game_service game)
      Init the game: the method gets data from the server, and updates the zone: the graph, agents, pokemons. Every agent is located on the edge's src node that his destined pokemon is on.

    • firstCatch

      private void firstCatch​(game_service game)
      In the first catch, every agent catches the pokemon, by order of value: The first one, catches the max valued pokemon.

    • pokemonsCatch

      private void pokemonsCatch​(game_service game)
      The main strategy of the agents, as for catching pokemons: Looks for the closest pokemon for every agent, uses shortestPathDist & shortestPath methods Looks for the pokemon with the closest src node.

    • max2MinValue

      private static java.util.LinkedList<CL_Pokemon> max2MinValue​(java.util.LinkedList<CL_Pokemon> pok_list)
      this method sorts the pokemons list by their value- from the max to the minimun values. this helps the strategy of the agents- to decide which pokemon to go catch first.
